name: api_physics2d_CompositeCollider2D
description: A Collider that can merge other Colliders together.

properties.name: edgeRadius
properties.description: Controls the radius of all edges created by the Collider.

properties.name: generationType
properties.description: Specifies when to generate the Composite Collider geometry.

properties.name: geometryType
properties.description: Specifies the type of geometry the Composite Collider should generate.

properties.name: offsetDistance
properties.description: Vertices are offset by this distance when compositing multiple physic shapes. Any vertices between s

properties.name: pathCount
properties.description: The number of paths in the Collider.

properties.name: pointCount
properties.description: Gets the total number of points in all the paths within the Collider.

properties.name: useDelaunayMesh
properties.description: When the value is true, the Collider uses an additional Delaunay triangulation step to produce the C

properties.name: vertexDistance
properties.description: Controls the minimum distance allowed between generated vertices.

properties.name: GenerateGeometry
properties.description: Regenerates the Composite Collider geometry.

properties.name: GetCompositedColliders
properties.description: When any Collider2D is using any composite operation other than Collider2D.CompositeOperation.None t

properties.name: GetPath
properties.description: Gets a path from the Collider by its index.

properties.name: GetPathPointCount
properties.description: Gets the number of points in the specified path from the Collider by its index.

properties.name: Destroy
properties.description: Removes a GameObject, component, or asset.

properties.name: DestroyImmediate
properties.description: Destroys the specified object immediately. Use with caution and in Edit mode only.

properties.name: DontDestroyOnLoad
properties.description: Do not destroy the target Object when loading a new Scene.

properties.name: FindAnyObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves any active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindFirstObjectByType
properties.description: Retrieves the first active loaded object of Type type.

properties.name: FindObjectsByType
properties.description: Retrieves a list of all loaded objects of Type type.

properties.name: Instantiate
properties.description: Clones the object original and returns the clone.
